abstract: “The Battle for Europe” is a five-part audio series from “The Daily” that asks: As nationalist and populist movements take root across the Continent, can the European Union survive?
lead_paragraph: “The Battle for Europe” is a five-part audio series from “The Daily” that asks: As nationalist and populist movements take root across the Continent, can the European Union survive? Listen to the episodes below, or read the transcripts by clicking the icon to the right of the play bar. For more information about the series, visit the show pages for Part 1, Part 2, Part 3, Part 4 and Part 5.
